instruction: Draft an apology email to a customer who experienced a delay in their order, and provide reassurance that the issue has been resolved.
output:
Subject: Apology for the Delay in Your Order and Assurance of Resolution

Dear [Customer's Name],

I am writing to express my sincerest apologies for the delay in processing your order. We understand that you placed your order on [Order Date] and expected to receive it by [Expected Delivery Date]. Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, we were unable to meet this deadline.

Please know that we take full responsibility for this delay and are deeply sorry for any inconvenience it may have caused. We understand that you may have had plans or expectations based on the original delivery date, and we are truly sorry for any disappointment this may have caused.

I want to assure you that we have taken steps to resolve the issue and prevent similar delays in the future. Our team is working diligently to process your order as quickly as possible and ensure that it is delivered to you as soon as possible.

We value your business and your satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help and will do everything we can to make things right.

Once again, we apologize for the delay and any inconvenience it may have caused. We look forward to serving you in the future and hope to have the opportunity to regain your trust.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Company]
